DOC.brief_summary: The addition of dexamethasone (DxaM) to local anesthetic may significantly prolong the duration of a block. The aim of this study is to determine whether this a systemic or local effect.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Perineural and Systemic Effect of Dexamethasone for Interscalene Brachial Plexus Block.
DOC.criteria: Presurgical patients for arthroscopic or open shoulder surgery Skin infection near block site Allergy to local anesthetics Peripheral neuropathy Proven opioid dependency Coagulopathy Dementia
